Ray Allen(Â·) nalecuhan i 7 bulad 20 demiad, 1975 a mihca, Ray Allen, u miunduay ciniza. Ray Allen unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. Ray Allen nalecuhan i Merced, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Ray Allen i 1996 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ku uwac atu silsil lima, namapili' tu nu Minnesota Timberwolves putiput.
